name: Yuwa's Way Out
description:
The game is about a girl who is trying to run away from her home and fights her mother twice on her way. Eventually, she has to defeat the grown-up version of Yuwa in order to escape from her life. 

Produced by

Chu Fang -> chufang@usc.edu

Jiayue Zhu -> 22, single, a joker -> jiayuezh@usc.edu
